name: Out of Control (DEMO)
description:
Out of Control, an artificial intelligence game that got out of control as a result of a software error during production.

Health, mana and skill bars are available. Don't forget to use it!

Destroy the enemies programmed to destroy you one by one. When playing against the clock, be careful where you step.

KEYS

Direction: W-A-D

Fire: Enter

Manuel/Auto: E

Pause: ESC/P
